alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:19PM CDT until June 11 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...ELLSWORTH...SOUTHEASTERN RUSSELL... NORTHEASTERN BARTON AND WESTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 1119 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brookville to Kanopolis to 7 miles west of Ellsworth, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salina, Ellsworth, Wilson, Kanopolis, Holyrood, Brookville, Smolan, Beverly, Lorraine, Falun, Glendale, Westfall, Salina Airport, Ellsworth Airport, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
